commit_message: Re-pin ggplot2 to 3.2.1 in tidyverse.yaml.
Remove references to shift analysis from Snakefile and config_template.yaml.
Update cluster requests, including increasing memory request for cutadapt to stop stalling.
Update cutadapt env to try to fix bug where cutadapt would stall after writing ~100MB when running distributed on cluster.
Add --conda-prefix to localrun.sh and slurm_submit.sh. Update envs.
Pin ggplot2 to 3.2.1.
Remove spikein proportion from config_template.yaml, as it is unused.
Make ratio_coverage a localrule.
Add basic distributional shift analyses based on comparing positions at which 50% of cumulative signal over a region is reached.
Add flags to make diffbind narrowpeak output safe for empty dataframes.
Remove coverage binsize spec from config_template.yaml
Update diffbind_to_narrowpeak to use ratio coverage, and handle the associated NaNs and Infs. Restore narrowpeak output.

Switch ratio coverage from DESeq2 ratio for each group to simple ratio of normalized smoothed midpoint coverage, as the normalization is not necessarily on the same scale for different groups when doing size factor normalization with subsets of samples.
Add ratio coverage binsize to config_template.yaml
Update datavis for ratio coverage.

Replace 'input-subtracted' coverage with IP over input ratio coverage. Input subtraction is not necessarily valid when spike-in normalization because the molecules per cell of the factor being IP'd may differ between the experimental and spikein species.
Reduce alpha in metagene plots.

Revert "Change log2 fold-change output of differential binding to shrunken values from ashr."

This reverts commit 934a80b7d8b18dd03cfc43a265df29a06cce2d9d.
Change log2 fold-change output of differential binding to shrunken values from ashr.
Remove extra whitespace in differential_binding_chipseq.R

Update differential binding script to get ChIP/input enrichment in condition and control conditions by extracting the relevant linear model coefficients rather than analyzing two extra DESeq datasets.
Merge branch 'chipseq' of https://github.com/winston-lab/chip-seq into chipseq
Correct secondary cluster config in slurm_submit.sh
Merge branch 'chipseq' of https://github.com/winston-lab/chip-seq into chipseq
Clean up some extraneous if else syntax.
Adjust spikein plot width.
Make count matrix input for differential binding actually compressed as file extension implies.
Remove extra legend in spikein abundance plotting.
Adjust width of spikein plot output.
Revert change to metagene color scales that made it safe to plot more than 12 groups, as this broke plotting for more than 2 annotations.
Remove legend title in input_coverage_datavis violin plots.

Fix major bug in midpoint coverage resulting from taking bedtools unionbedg of bedgraphs with overlapping annotations due to shifting at end of chromosomes. This resulted in certain sections of coverage being lost.
Make input_coverage_datavis.R safe for more than 12 groups.
Set limitsize=FALSE in ggsave calls in input_coverage_datavis.R
Add rule and script for input coverage datavis, for detecing aneuploidies and large scale CNV.
Fix bug in heatmap facetting when plotting >1 annotation.
Fix plot label spacing in differential binding qc plots.
Fix percent loss in processing summary to actually be a percentage.

Edit cluster requests.

Update slurm_submit runtime.
Set maximum of 10 conditions for plotting all-v-all figures.
Add checks for library size normalized comparisons to enable only spike-in comparisons to be specified.
Fix broken control and condition wildcard constraints for spike-in groups.
Update localrun script to use all available cores.
Update cluster requests.
Merge branch 'chipseq' of https://github.com/winston-lab/chip-seq into chipseq
Conclude slurm_submit.sh merge.
Reduce cores request in slurm_submit.
Make smaller rules localrules. Make figure plotting safe for >12 groups. Fix filtering for valid comparisons.
Update slurm_submit.sh
Update spikein plotting to be safe for more than 12 groups.
Update cluster requests.

Set limitsize=FALSE in processing_summary.R

Update environments.

Update peak calling to use IDR. Update differential expression to use multi-factor design taking IP/input and conditions into account. Add smoothed midpoint coverage.
Linting.
Update tidyverse environment and R scripts for updated dplyr version. Remove vestigial mnase-seq scripts.
Add slurm_status.sh script for detecting SLURM job timeouts and cancellations.
Edit spikein plotting to not break when no spikein comparisons are provided. Add back missing flags for figure plotting.
Add missing flags to allow runs with no spike-in normalized comparisons.
Update cluster requests.
Add a check for when no additional annotations are provided for differential occupancy analysis.
Edit cluster requests.
Fix counts output of differential binding script.
Update cluster requests.
Fix annotation wildcard constraint.
Update wildcard constraints for differential binding over annotations.
Update config template for differential binding over annotations.

Reconfigure differential binding script to handle the case when feature names as assigned as a result of the differential binding analysis (as is done for peaks). Feature names are also made consistent between IP and input differential binding analyses.
Add updated differential binding script. This is BROKEN currently when counts over peaks are given as input.
Start differential binding module, with cleaned up mapping and combining functions.
Add strand information to peak merging for differential binding to allow differential binding over provided annotations. Edit cluster requests.
Update README.
Fix raw and processed fastqc writing to same location.
Some modifications to plot sizes to accomodate the longer sample names of chipseq samples.
Update cluster requests.
Add datavis of input-subtracted coverage.
Update with spike-in normalization taking abundance in input into consideration. Additionally rules to generate input-subtracted tracks, and datavis for input-subtracted coverage.

ChIP-seq updates.

Update dependencies.
Adjust cluster requests. Add missing subworkflow call.
Reduce cluster requests.
Update snakemake dependency to 5.3.0
Tweak location of fasta merging output.
Update subworkflow calls to allow build annotations workflow on different directory level.
Fix incorrect request for bowtie2 indices.
Add rule for autogenerating combined FASTA file if using spikeins. Clean up variable naming.
Corrected incorrect filepath in quantification visualization.
Update README for publication.
Fix bug in raw fastqc of unmatched files of both reads trying to read/delete the same fastq file. Update default environment. Remove accidental inclusion of danpos .pyc files in tracking.
Increase cluster request for SLURM job to speed up environment creation.
Add dryrun shell script.
Update SLURM execution script to actually rerun on input and parameter changes.
Update comparisons to handle the same group being used as condition multiple times.
Update environment specifications to blacklist default conda R channels.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/winston-lab/mnase-seq
Update snakemake dependency to 5.2.0
Make specification of unmatched fastq in config file optional.
Remove environment activation from svg to png conversion script.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/winston-lab/mnase-seq
Correct typo in README.
Adjust cluster request for scatterplots.
Remove unneeded csv import.
Move spikein normalization of danpos quantification to function in separate script so that the spikein table is correctly identified as an input file.
Coerce spikein counts from table to float for division in danpos spikein normalization function.
Lint config template.
Correct flag to allow running with spikein samples but no spikein comparisons specified in config file. Add config template. Change fastqc of unmatched to allow multiple unmatched fastq files.
Add license and readme. Adjust syntax so that combinedgenome specification is not required in config file if no samples have spikein.
Remove dependence on chromosome size files. Sizes are now generated from fasta as needed.
Add conda environments.
Add flag to toggle figure plotting.
Minor cleanup to target rule.
Fill missing data for heatmaps not sorted by length.
Simplified target rule.
Add back plotting of fragment length distributions.
Reconnect differential occupancy and quantification analyses. Clean up helper functions.
Corrected error in updated spikein plotting samplelists.
Updated spikein plotting, corrected spikein counts table.
Genome coverage filename fix.
Fixed a missing f-string.
Bugfix associated with changing mean to mid and calling maxima.
Reconnect datavis module with updated spread plotting (corrected 95% CI or quantiles).
Reconnect and update scatter plot module. Fixed bug in sample_list function where condition and status wildcards were mixed up.
Reconnect library processing and spikein summaries.
Refactor alignment and genome coverage to skip species splitting if no samples have spikein. Make normalization steps more efficient by using bam instead of bedgraph to get total counts.
Reconnect alignment, update fastqc module.

Begin refactoring Snakefile into separate rule files. Move demultiplexing to separate pipeline in order to accomodate multiple fastq files (Cannot keep in single pipeline and specify demultiplexing outputs.).
Make condition and control specification in config file more friendly.
Coerce counts for spikein normalization for DANPOS2 to int.
Fix error in spikein calculation for DANPOS2 step.
More fixes to danpos2 spikein function.
Add danpos2 analysis with spikeins if spikein samples are available.
Bugfix for danpos quantification using center as reference point.
Unfollow mogrify log
Quick hack to allow alignment to center of alignments in danpos quantification over annotations.
Fixed bug in specifying the start and endpoints of the segment plot showing integrated displacement.
Add script to generate png copies of all svgs created, in series.
Add strand information of annotation back into differential level testing.
Change differential level filepaths to branch by normalization.
Added differential nucleosome level analysis summing fragments over midpoints.
fixes for nucleosome quantification over annotations for multiple annotations
label fixes for danpos over annotations facet labels
Fixes for danpos visualization over annotations output for more than one annotation.
Forgot to add the script to the last commit.
Add visualization of danpos results over annotations.
Add rules to aggregate danpos results over annotations for visualization.
Add metaheatmap plots to figure plotting with quantification of peak distances.
Fix rescaling function in figure plotting.
Fix bug in figure plotting (wrong dataframe specified for one of the metagenes)
Fix wildcard naming error.
Added back missing comma to plot_mnase_figures...
Minor update to heatmap colorbar label in dyad vs wholefragment.
For figure plotting, if a condition and control pair does not include the samples used to cluster on, include those samples.
Fixes and updates for figure plotting.
Updated heatmap/metagene plotting with clustering and seriation. When clustering or sorting by length, annotations are returned for clusters. Output dissimilarity plots to assess number of clusters.
Deprecated kmer content plots in fastqc summary since the newer versions of fastqc don't produce this output.
Added missing spikein percentage plotting.
Change binwidth for geom_histogram in dyad shift histograms.
Add nucleosome calling with DANPOS and visualization of changes in occupancy, position, and fuzziness.
Update paths for condition and control, update correlation plotting.
Get fragment lengths table, roll melt_matrix into compute_matrix rule.
Fix fastqc_raw.
Run fastqc_raw sequentially.
Fix indexing bug in processing summary.
Do processed fastqc sequentially on r1 and r2 to avoid fastqc bugs and problems with writing to protected directory.
Typo in sipct.
Fastqc and processing summaries.
Start adding fastqc and processing summaries.
Fix awk formatting for snakemake.
Update bam species splitting, correct midpoint coverage, add back correlation plotting.
Small updates to metagene plotting.
Cluster requests.
Revert to cutadapt 1.14 to try to troubleshoot premature FASTQ end errors.
Reduced cluster requests for heatmaps and metagenes.
Fixed bug in heatmap plotting causing computation to be extremely slow. The calculation for percent cutoff was being repeated for every single data point.
Fix for cyclic dependency in normalization, ambiguity when separating species.
Switch to updated heatmap and metagene plotting modified from ChIP-nexus pipeline.
Update computematrix and melt_matrix for correct positions, even with binsize 1
Fix upstream boundary in deeptools matrix.
Add back data visualization.
Fixed bug in melt matrix where index column was being written as numeric (scientific notation) instead of integer.
Fixes for midpoint coverage.
Get coverage by species.

Fixed the fix for read 2 adapter and quality trimming: Reverted 'A' tail to 'T' tail, added maximum length filtering as a way to eliminate pairs without read2 adapters, change error rate to 0.15 to allow 1 mismatch.
Fix bug in cutadapt where adapters were not properly being removed from read 2.
Update MNase-seq pipeline to accomodate spikeins and bring it up to date with other pipeliens.
Small updates to datavis, added shell script for SLURM execution.
Updates for datavis, matrix melting, deeptoolsmatrix.
Been so long I forgot what I was doing before this commit.
Forgot to commit after adding DANPOS a while back.
danpos now runs, but still need to group bam files into group directories for it to treat them as replicates.
Rewrite heatmap and metagene plotting.
Reorganize sample/barcode labeling to incorporate sample group information for easier facetting in metagenes/heatmaps.
Add Gaussian smoothing of MNase midpoints.
Fixes to metagene plotting for genic, broke it for TSS annotations.
Add metagene plotting, separate parameters for each annotation file for heatmaps/metagenes, add cluster configuration.
Add sequencing depth quality control, heatmaps.
Add pairwise scatter-plots, sample-sample distance heatmaps, PCA w/scree plot.
Switch from deeptools to bedtools-based generation of coverage files, make improved fragment size distribution pipeline (without deeptools).
Change cutadapt output so no reads less than 5nt get passed to bowtie to avoid errors.
Update rule 'all', update localrules.
Add pre- and post- demultiplex/trimming FastQC, deepTools QC plotting.
Fully integrated NUCwave into the pipeline and deeptools coverage mapping.
Integrate bowtie and NUCwave.
Initial commit.
